name: DesterLib
description: DesterLib is a powerful and lightweight media solution to interface your movie and TV libraries in a goddamn gorgeous way.

PINGER.description: The pinger pings your app every 15 minutes to prevent it from sleeping. Input the URL of your app (e.g. https://APP_NAME.herokuapp.com). Leave empty if you don't want to use the pinger

PINGER_INTERVAL.description: How often, in seconds, the pinger will be used

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: Don't change this, leave the value as 1
